items.name: AddStyle
items.description: Add a CSS class to a panel.
items.description_cn: 添加CSS样式类到面板

items.description: Add a CSS class to a panel after a specified delay.

items.description: Add a CSS class to all children of this panel.

items.name: AddTimedStyle
items.signature: AddTimedStyle(class: panoramasymbol, duration: float, preDelay: float): void
items.description: Add a class for a specified duration, with optional pre-delay; clears existing timers when called with same class.
items.description_cn: 添加 a class for a 指定的 durati到, with opti到al pre-延迟后; clears existing timers when called with same class.

items.description_cn: 关闭所有打开的上下文菜单

items.description: Drop focus entirely from the window containing this panel.

items.description_cn: 在外部浏览器中打开URL

items.name: IfHasClassEvent
items.description: Fire another event if this panel has a given class.
items.description_cn: 如果面板有指定CSS类则触发事件

items.name: IfHoverOtherEvent
items.description: Fire another event if currently hovering over a panel with the given ID.
items.description_cn: 如果悬停在其他元素上则触发事件

items.name: IfNotHasClassEvent
items.description: Fire another event if this panel does not have a given class.
items.description_cn: 如果面板没有指定CSS类则触发事件

items.name: IfNotHoverOtherEvent
items.description: Fire another event if not currently hovering over a panel with the given ID.
items.name_cn: 如果没有悬停其他事件
items.description_cn: 如果没有悬停在其他元素上则触发事件

items.name: MovePanelDown
items.description: Move down from the panel. By default, this will change the focus position, but other panel types may implement this differently.
items.description_cn: 将面板在父容器中向下移动

items.name: MovePanelLeft
items.description: Move left from the panel. By default, this will change the focus position, but other panel types may implement this differently.
items.description_cn: Move left from  面板. By default, this will change  焦点 positi到, but or 面板 types may implement this differently.

items.name: MovePanelRight
items.description: Move right from the panel. By default, this will change the focus position, but other panel types may implement this differently.
items.description_cn: Move right from  面板. By default, this will change  焦点 positi到, but or 面板 types may implement this differently.

items.name: MovePanelUp
items.description: Move up from the panel. By default, this will change the focus position, but other panel types may implement this differently.
items.description_cn: 将面板在父容器中向上移动

items.name: SetChildPanelsSelected
items.description: Set whether any child panels are :selected.

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description_cn: 是否选中的布尔值参数

items.description_cn: 设置子面板的选中状态

items.name: SetInputFocus
items.description: Set focus to this panel.
items.description_cn: 将输入焦点设置到面板

items.name: SetPanelEnabled
items.description: Sets whether the given panel is enabled
items.description_cn: 设置面板是否启用

items.name: SetPanelSelected
items.description: Set whether this panel is :selected.
items.description_cn: 设置面板的选中状态

items.name: SwitchStyle
items.description: Switch which class the panel has for a given attribute slot. Allows easily changing between multiple states.
items.description_cn: Switch which class  面板 has for a given attribute slot. Allows easily changing between multiple states.

items.name: TogglePanelSelected
items.description: Toggle whether this panel is :selected.

items.name: ToggleStyle
items.description: Toggle whether a panel has the given CSS class.
items.description_cn: 切换面板的CSS类

items.name: TriggerStyle
items.description: Remove then immediately add back a CSS class from a panel. Useful to re-trigger events like animations or sound effects.
items.description_cn: 触发样式变化
